description:
A man wants to be a Sennin but fails, so he becomes a salesman instead.  Kobayashi Issa, the haiku poet, thinks of the sun, the moon, and his soba.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Story of Sage Kume / The Moon, the Buddha, and My Soba
Kume Sennin no Hanashi / Tsuki to Hotoke to Ora ga Soba
久米仙人の話 / 月と仏とおらが蕎麦
